message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $80?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $80, so I'm offering you the product for $85. It's a great price, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $82.50. Would you be willing to accept that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm not willing to go below $87.50. I think that's a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
